Class CarServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.generic.CrudServiceGeneric<CarEntity,Long>
com.app.service.impl.CarServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CarService, CrudService<CarEntity,Long>
@Service public class CarServiceImpl extends CrudServiceGeneric<CarEntity,Long> implements CarService
The CarServiceImpl class implements the CarService interface and provides functionality for managing car-related operations such as saving, filtering, grouping, and sorting cars.

This class interacts with the CarRepository and ComponentRepository to perform CRUD operations on car entities and components. It also supports various advanced operations like grouping cars, getting statistics, and filtering by different criteria such as speed, price, and components.

      carSpecificationImpl - the specification implementation for car filtering.
      validator - the validator for CreateCarDto objects.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public Long save(CreateCarDto createCarDto)
      Saves a new car entity based on the provided data transfer object (DTO).
      Specified by:
      save in interface CarService
      Parameters:
      createCarDto - the data transfer object containing car information.
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly saved car.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if any of the components in the DTO are not found.

    • saveAll

      public List<Long> saveAll(List<CreateCarDto> cars)
      Saves a list of car entities based on the provided list of DTOs.
      Specified by:
      saveAll in interface CarService
      Parameters:
      cars - the list of data transfer objects representing cars.
      Returns:
      a list of IDs of the newly saved cars.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if any of the components in the DTOs are not found.

    • sortedCarsBy

      public List<CarDto> sortedCarsBy(List<String> parameters, String direction)
      Returns a list of cars sorted by specified parameters and order direction.
      Specified by:
      sortedCarsBy in interface CarService
      Parameters:
      parameters - a list of parameters to sort the cars by.
      direction - the direction of sorting, either "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending.
      Returns:
      a list of sorted car DTOs.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters or direction are invalid.
